siteMetadata.title: Ghost Docs
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about working with the Ghost professional publishing platform.

ghostPost.title: How do I delete my publication?
ghostPost.excerpt: Backup your content using the Ghost export tool and delete your publication in a few clicks!
ghostPost.meta_title: How do I delete my Ghost publication? - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Backup your content using the Ghost export tool and delete your publication in a few clicks! You will need to confirm your site's subdomain to process this request.

tags.description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) customers!
tags.meta_description: If you get stuck, browse our commonly asked questions, or contact email support for Ghost(Pro) premium hosted customers!
tags.meta_title: Ghost(Pro) FAQs – Find answers & support for your site

ghostPost.plaintext:
Before deleting a publication, it is strongly recommended that you make a backup
of any content using the Ghost export tool
[https://help.ghost.org/article/13-import-export].

To delete your site, log into Ghost.org [https://my.ghost.org/]  and on the
publication use the "Delete" button on the "more" dropdown menu. 

You will need to confirm the publication's subdomain to process the request. 
Once the site has been deleted, it is irreversible.
ghostPost.html:
Before deleting a publication, it is strongly recommended that you make a backup of any content using the Ghost export tool.

To delete your site, log into Ghost.org and on the publication use the "Delete" button on the "more" dropdown menu.

You will need to confirm the publication's subdomain to process the request. Once the site has been deleted, it is irreversible.
